emergence.agents

Class EvolutionaryAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.player.AbstractPlayer
      • emergence.agents.EvolutionaryAgent

  • public class EvolutionaryAgent
extends core.player.AbstractPlayer
    The evolutionary agent (3rd controller). It uses an evolutionary algorithm to choose the next action which will be executed
